Hi, I was trying to connect to the radio with my laptop(not 6E enabled) but i switched the #3 port on the radio and configured it. My team number isnt popping up on the wifi tab. Also i am in the EU(if that maked any effect) Heres the radio status lights

frc-radio.vivid-hosting.net

TEAM ACCESS POINT mode is for bridging a connection to another VH-109 in ROBOT RADIO mode.
If you only have a single VH-109 and want to connect directly to it you’ll want select ROBOT RADIO mode and follow the instructions here
https://frc-radio.vivid-hosting.net/overview/programming-your-radio-at-home

Also it looks like you are still on 1.1.2, you’ll also want to upgrade to 1.2.8, instructions for which can be found here.
https://frc-radio.vivid-hosting.net/overview/upgrading-firmware
